OOC: I guess the best way is to think of a crashed ship similar to the Axal=
on. It is mostly not functional and has begun to break down from the weathe=
r and othe natural events. Rodimus still has his signature masker and cloak=
ing device activated.
=A0
::Dark Rodimus::
=A0
Rodimus awakens which slows =
the upload but does not stop it. His signature tracking device he had used =
to locate the pod was picking up a new signature in the area. He was unable=
 to lock down any specific locations, however. The signature was clear thou=
gh: Minions!
=A0
Rodimus: Perceptor, it looks like I have company. Minions =
are close to my position. I might have to break the link and defend myself.=

> Rodimus opens up a access hatch on his left wrist.

wo wires and connects to some ports

> Rodimu=
s: I've connected to the pod. You can start
> downloading through my system=
s across the commlink.
> I think it'll work as a decent datalink.

Even as =
Rodimus worked to gather information, outside a few sweeps 
led by their fe=
ral master Scourge touched down. With their sensor 
scattering armor they w=
ere virtually undetectable, and their 
movements were stealthy and swift. 
=

While Scourge could not pick up Rodimus directly, the trail he had 
left b=
ehind him had led here. Sweeps were designed to be hunters and 
trackers, a=
nd to follow such a scent was child's play. Yet Scourge 
could not repress =
a shudder of eagerness as he imagined the 
culmination of this hunt: Rodimu=
s! He frowned as he knew that this 
was not Rodimus PRIME, and yet he was s=
omething more than Hot Rod. 
Scourge had been somewhat confused by the read=
ings Cyclonus had shown 
him from the memory download. 

With a shrug he mo=
tioned to the sweeps for them to spread out and 
begin searching for their =
quarry as Scourge followed the scent 
further onwards. Quickly the sweeps c=
omplied, weapons drawn and 
ready, they all began to move amongst the build=
ing(s).

((OOC: I am not sure at what I am working with here. Is there

thing like a description for this place?))

<P>::Dark Rodimus::</P>
<P> </P>
<P>Rodimus awakens which slows the upload but does not stop it. His signature tracking device he had used to locate the pod was picking up a new signature in the area. He was unable to lock down any specific locations, however. The signature was clear though: Minions!</P>
